Step 4. Change Owner 
 
 
 Step (Lv.2) 1. Record Transfer Step (Lv.3) 1.1 Record Transfer 
 
 Menu Change Owner User All Users 
 
 Navigation Change Owner > Transfer 
 
 1. Click [Change Owner] menu 
 1 
 
 2. Set Owner / Change Owner 
 3 5 
 Owner: User who will transfer records
 (Default: Currently logged-in user)
 2 
 Change Owner: User who will receive
 records (Search users after clicking
 text box) 
 4 
 
 3. Click [Search] button after setting
 Change Owner to retrieve 
 
 transferable records 
 
 
 4. Select records to transfer in each
 category 
 
 
 
 5. Click [Change] button to transfer
 selected records

Step 1. Login 
 
 
 Step (Lv.2) 1. App Login Step (Lv.3) 1.1 App Login(1/3) 
 
 Menu User All Users 
 
 Navigation 
 
 1. Download 'Salesforce' from Apple App
 Store/Google Play Store and run 
 Apple App Store: 
 https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/salesforce/i
 
 d404249815 
 1 
 Google Play Store: 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details
 ?id=com.salesforce.chatter&pcampaignid=
 3 
 web_share 
 4 
 2. Click [Use Custom Domain] button
 5 
 2 
 3. Enter 'poscointl' in the custom domain
 input field 
 
 
 4. Verify that the domain at the bottom
 changes to 
 https://poscointl.my.salesforce.com
 
 
 5. Click [Continue] button 
 
 
 20

Step 1. Login 
 
 
 Step (Lv.2) 1. App Login Step (Lv.3) 1.1 App Login(2/3) 
 
 Menu User All Users 
 
 Navigation 
 
 1. Click [Login with ENTRA ID] button
 
 
 2. Enter Entra ID 
 e.g. EP ID@poscointl.com 
 2 
 4 
 
 1 3. Click [Next] button 
 3 
 5 
 4. Enter Entra PW 
 e.g. EP PW 
 
 
 
 5. Click [Sign in] button 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 21

Step 1. Login 
 
 
 Step (Lv.2) 1. App Login Step (Lv.3) 1.1 App Login(3/3) 
 
 Menu User All Users 
 
 Navigation 
 
 1. When 'Don't show again' option is
 selected, this screen will not appear
 again in the current session 
 
 
 
 2. Clicking [Yes] button maintains the
 session even after closing the 
 1 
 browser 
 2 
 
 3. Click [Allow] button to allow 
 Salesforce for iOS access 
 If [Deny] is selected, Salesforce for
 
 iOS application cannot be used. 
 
 
 3 
 4. Login completed
